text: Haja haya kayekati subikhyata mase, kaje'i ye ke'u e'i samaye haja karara sankalpa kare tara jan'ya e-sabera madhye stri-gamana ba dustami thakabe na, ba hajera madhye tarkatarki calabe na. Ara bhalo ya-kichu tomara kara, allah ta janena. Ara patheya sangraha karo, nihsandeha srestha patheya hacche dharmaparayanata. Ata'eba amake bhaya-srad'dha karo, he jnanera adhikarisaba
